title: THREE BEDROOM LOWER GROSSE POINTE PARK MUST SEE
posting_body: Gorgeous updated hardwood floors,--all appliances INCLUDED.
You have immediate access to GP schools, two resident only parks--two resident only movie theaters- gym----three libraries---pools--etc.
Both --snow removal is included--lawn care is included.
WALK to many restaurants, bars, stores.
Right on the bus line and trolley line too.
Don't wait...will not be available long.
Thorough background check and credit checks certainly will be done.
No emails please, they will not be answered.
